```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Lahman)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

``` {r}
head(HallOfFame, 3);
```

``` {r}
HallOfFame %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = yearID, fill = inducted)) +
  geom_bar() +
  xlim(c(1936, 2022))
```

``` {r}
write.csv(HallOfFame, "HallOfFame.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```
